QuestData.Title: Cold Steel Part II
QuestData.Description: Hey, you.$B$BI wanted to thank you for what you did for me. The feel of that cannon in my hands is all the therapy I'll ever need. But now...$B$B<Keeshan stares off into the distance and grimaces.>...I'm all out of bullets.$B$BGuess I'll just sit here and wait to die.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find an Iron Autocannon in Grimrail Depot.
